item.title: Barry Bonds: The Best Hitter of All Time?
item.description: On August 7, 2007 Barry Bonds enshrined his name into baseball and sports history. Just a few nights earlier Bonds hit home run 755 in San Diego with his arch nemesis MLB Commissioner Bud Selig watching from a suite. Then on a cold and windy summer night in the City by the bay, Bonds hit a towering home run into the right center bleachers to break Hank Aaronâ€™s home run record.
